title: Jennifer Lopez cozies up to Kate Hudson and Lady Gaga at Golden Globes after party
title_page: Jennifer Lopez cozies up to Kate Hudson and Lady Gaga at Golden Globes after party | Daily Mail Online
text:
Jennifer Lopez is so focused on work (American Idol, Shades Of Blue, her Vegas residency) and two kids (twins Max and Emme) that it's surprising she has time for friends.
But at the Golden Globes on Sunday evening, the 46-year-old star chatted up plenty of other celebrities.
While at the CAA after party, the Jenny From The Block beauty cozied up to her 'girls' Lady Gaga and Kate Hudson.
Scroll down for video and winners box...
Pals: Jennifer Lopez shared a photo with Kate Hudson and Lady Gaga at the CAA Golden Globes after party on Sunday evening
The looker shared a photo of the three and captioned it, 'The girls and the globe!! Congrats Gaga! #goldenglobes #CAA #afterparty.'
Turns out, J-Lo and Gaga are old pals. Gaga helped the Bronx babe write some of her songs for her Love album along with producer RedOne.
Kate and Jennifer seem to have been friends for years as they have been spotted at parties together for years.
See more of the latest pictures and videos from the 2016 Golden Globes after party
Keeping Up With The Kardashians: JLo and Casper Smart chatted to Kourtney Kardashian and Kylie Jenner
Deep in conversation: Kourtney and Jennifer appeared to be getting on like a house on fire
Lopez was also seen partying with Kylie Jenner and Kourtney Kardashian.
Jennifer has been friends with the Keeping Up With The Kardashians for years and they used to be neighbors when the I Luh Ya Papi singer owned a home in Hidden Hills near Kris Jenner.
She was even seen at Kris' annual Christmas Eve bash.
Catching up: The singer and actress chatted to Hollywood hardman Jason Statham
The curvy singer also took time out to chat with her Parker co-star Jason Statham.
He is newly engaged to Rosie Huntington-Whiteley.
Lopez showed up to the Globes in a stunning canary Giambattista Valli Haute Couture design, which she accessorized with glittering Jimmy Choo shoes, a Judith Leiber Couture crystal herringbone clutch and over 200 carats of Harry Winston Diamonds including a 46.95-carat Diamond wreath necklace.
She later changed into a white dress.
Picture perfect: Lopez looked incredible in a white gown with a subtle side split as she kept the party going at the Beverly Hills Hilton after the 2016 Golden Globes on Sunday
Ray of sunshine: JLo stood out in a bright yellow number with a show-stopping train when she attended the main awards show earlier in the day
Helping his lady out: Smart held up a bottle of water for his longtime love
See full Golden Globes coverage on the winners and red carpet fashion
Classy: The singer and actress upped the glamour with silver accessories, including expensive jewellery and a sparkling clutch bag
Coordinating: The 46-year-old beauty sported a slick of dark red lipstick and a matching manicure
Date night: The star was joined by her boyfriend Smart at the after-party, looking dapper in a tux
Figure-hugging: The white number made the most of the On The Floor hitmaker's incredible curves
The On The Floor hitmaker opted for a tousled blow dry, and a vampish slick of dark red lipstick and a matching manicure.
Her date to the bash was boyfriend Casper Smart, who let her have her moment in the spotlight by walking the red carpet alone.
Thrice-married Jennifer - who has tied the knot with Ojani Noa, Cris Judd and Marc Anthony in the past - recently insisted she won't be getting married to the choreographer.
Dramatic: JLo accessorised with a sparkling red lipstick and beautiful drop earrings
Tender touch: Casper kept a protective arm on his partner's back as they walked the red carpet
Keeping the party going: The couple then headed on to the Universal, NBC, Focus Features and E! Entertainment Golden Globe after-party
She knows her angles! The brunette beauty ensured she looked her best on the red carpet
'No wedding. Thereâ€™s no wedding', she declared when Ellen DeGeneres pressed her about future plans. 'Honest!', she added after the chat show host appeared disbelieving.
The Golden Globe Awards are bestowed by the 93 members of the Hollywood Foreign Press Association (HFPA) and recognise excellence in film and television, both domestic and foreign.
While their record in predicting Oscars glory has been hit-and-miss, many see the Globes as a pretty strong indicator of films and actors destined for an Academy Award on February 28.
British comedian Ricky Gervais returned as host, taking over duties from Tina Fey and Amy Poehler, marking his fourth time hosting the ceremony
